SEARCH
Package AdventureModel

Class AchievementEvent

java.lang.Object
java.util.EventObject
javafx.event.Event
AdventureModel.AchievementEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class AchievementEvent extends javafx.event.Event
This class represents an event that is fired when an achievement is unlocked. It contains the name of the achievement that was unlocked.
See Also:

      public static javafx.event.EventType<AchievementEvent> ACHIEVEMENT_UNLOCKED
      The type of event that is fired when an achievement is unlocked. The event type is ACHIEVEMENT_UNLOCKED.
